name: Draggexath's Dominion
description:
"You are a young warrior returning from a long quest. When you return home to sleep something strange happens. You begin a new quest in search of the legendary demon god to get out of the now strange world that you once knew..."

Draggexath's Dominion is an Adventure RPG game set in a fantasy world where The Demon God Draggexath rules in his Realm of Darkness you're job is to find him, kill him and return to your world!

This is the alpha for Draggexath's Dominion an Adventure RPG game I'm making! Please be patient with updates as I'm the sole developer and I'm not always able to work on updates for the game! Paying/Donating for the game is NOT required but it would be very much appreciated! Donations will allow me to keep working on the game as RPG Maker MZ requires money to use it so for anyone who donates I thank you a lot!

THIS GAME IS ONLY AVAILABLE ON ITCH.IO IF YOU GET THIS ANYWHERE ELSE IT IS NOT REAL!!!!
